fields.text: Thank you for calling 3scale in San Francisco, your API management solution from Red Hat.
For developer support and API integration help, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our developer support team.
For technical troubleshooting and issue resolution, press [INDEX].
One moment please, we’re connecting you to technical troubleshooting.
For sales inquiries and pricing information, press [INDEX].
For details on standard pricing plans, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we gather our standard plan pricing.
For enterprise solutions and custom quotes, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise sales team.
